humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: According to the pathology report, the patient has metastatic carcinoma in one sentinel lymph node (pN1a), and no metastatic carcinoma in the other sentinel lymph node (0/1). This corresponds to N1 stage based on the new rule 12: N1 indicates metastases in 1 to 3 axillary lymph nodes (No/Total).

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The patient has metastatic carcinoma in one out of the two sentinel lymph nodes examined (pN1a), as per the pathologic staging in the report.
